name: Rollin Knockout
description:
You are a Boxer Kangaroo with roller skates. 

Controls Mouse and keyborad

WASD: Move Character

Space: Jump

Left/Right mouse klick: Bunch

Joystick

LeftStick: Move Character

A: Jump

Triggers/X/B: Bunch

This Game is on alpha state

My first game with sound and with character animations

Not Done list:

Camera movement.

Map the warehouse.

Enemies

and the Boss.

This Game is for 

Curdle Jam #30

Enjoy :)
